home.welcome: Welcome to the KrUltra Runners Hub!

mo.title: Malvikingen Opp
mo.tagline: Malvik's oldest fell race – from Fjord to Peak since 2011
mo.taglineShort: Earn your 'MalViking' title in Malvik's oldest fell race.
mo.aboutText: Malvikingen Opp runs from Vikhammerløkka to Solemsvåttan. The length is 6 km, and the elevation difference between start and finish is 420 meters.
mo.courseDesc: 6 km (3.7 mi) from the fjord at Vikhammerløkka to the top of Solemsvåttan.
mo.elevationDesc: The course starts as close to sea level as you can get, and finishes at 423 masl (1387 ft). Except for a small downhill after about 2 km / 1.2 mi, it's uphill almost the entire way.
mo.classesDesc: The race has competition classes with women's and men's categories, but what makes the race unique is the main class for all-against-all where time is adjusted for age and gender. Additionally, there's a timed recreational class and a family-friendly hiking class.
mo.since2011Desc: Malvikingen Opp is Malvik's oldest fell race and is organized by KrUltra on behalf of Malvik IL Friidrett. The race has been held every year since 2011.
mo.registrationInfoDesc: Links to registration and information about deadlines are published in the relevant edition – follow the link to the next race for details.
mo.competitionTimedDesc: Participation costs 250 NOK. One-day license is additional for runners without an annual license.

kutc.title: Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge
kutc.taglineShort: Find your distance. Find your limit.

kutc.noResultsAvailableYet: No results available yet. Check back after the first KUTC event!
kutc.aboutText: Kruke's Ultra-Trail Challenge is a multi-loop ultra trail race on the border between Malvik and Trondheim.
kutc.lastOneStanding: All participants are part of the 'Last One Standing' challenge!
kutc.allParticipantsLOS: All participants are part of the 'Last One Standing' challenge!

allTime.title: KUTC All-Time Leaderboard
allTime.subtitle: Total loops completed across all KUTC editions
allTime.summary: Showing {{participants}} participants across {{editions}} editions with a total of {{loops}} completed loops
allTime.explanation: Numbers show completed loops for that edition. A value of 0 means the runner registered but did not start (DNS). A dash (-) means the runner did not participate that year.

records.title: KUTC Records
records.subtitle: All-time records and achievements
records.fastestRaceTimesIntro: The records listed for the various distances below are based only on times recorded by runners who were registered for that specific race distance. Split times from runners registered for a different race distance do not count as records, even if the time is faster than that of those registered as records for the race distance in question.

raceAvailabilityNotes.7Loops: (this race distance was only available in 2018, 2019 and 2020)

registration.title: Registration
registration.updateRunnerProfile: Update my runner profile with these details
registration.updateRunnerProfileInfo: Yes: Your runner profile will be updated with the details from this registration. No: Your runner profile will not be changed.

form.personalInfoDesc: Please provide your personal details for registration.
form.emailHelper: We'll send your registration confirmation to this email
form.raceDetailsDesc: Select your race and provide additional information.
form.medicalHelper: Any medical conditions we should be aware of
form.commentsHelper: Any additional information you'd like to share with the organizers
form.travelHelper: Please describe your travel plans to help us minimize our carbon footprint
form.reviewDesc: Please review your registration details before submitting.
form.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
form.paymentAfterSubmit: After submitting your registration, you will need to pay the following fees:
form.paymentRequired: Your registration requires the following payments:
form.paymentInstructions: Payment instructions will be sent to your email after registration.
form.paymentNotValid: Registration is not valid until the full payment has been made.
form.notifyFutureEventsLabel: Notify me and send me information about future events
form.notifyFutureEventsInfo: Yes: You will receive important updates about future events. This includes an invitation to pre-register for next year's event before registration opens to the general public. No: You will not receive these updates or pre-registration invitations.
form.sendRunningOffersLabel: Send me relevant information and offers related to trail and ultra running
form.sendRunningOffersInfo: Yes: KrUltra may send you relevant information and occasional offers related to trail and ultra running. We have a very restrictive marketing profile and will not fill up your inbox. No: You will not receive these messages.
form.confirmTerms: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and I accept the
form.termsAcceptedInfo: Yes: You accept the terms and conditions and can submit your registration. No: You cannot submit your registration.
form.waitlistExpiryLabel: I want my spot on the waiting-list to expire if I'm not promoted to the participants list before the following date:
form.paymentInfoAlert: After submitting your registration, you will need to complete the payment process separately. Details will be sent to your email address.
form.hasYearLicense: Do you have a full-year NFIF athletics license?
form.hasYearLicenseHelper: NFIF (Norwegian Athletics Association) requires participants in sanctioned events to have a license.
form.licenseYes: Yes, I have a full-year license
form.licenseNo: No, I need a one-time license
form.hasYearLicenseRequired: Please indicate if you have a full-year license
form.oneTimeLicenseInfo: A one-time license fee of {{amount}} kr will be added to your registration.
form.yearLicenseInfo: No license fee will be charged since you have a full-year license.
form.licenseNotRequired: No license required for this race class.
